com.stefanbrenner.droplet.utils
Class FileUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.stefanbrenner.droplet.utils.FileUtils

public final class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object

File manipulation utils.

This class provides static utility methods for file manipulations.

Author:
Stefan Brenner

Method Summary

          Returns the name of the file without any file extensions.

          Returns the name of the file without any file extensions.
static java.io.File newFileBasedOn(java.io.File file, java.lang.String extension)

getFilename

public static java.lang.String getFilename(java.io.File file,
                                           boolean absolute)
Returns the name of the file without any file extensions.

Parameters:
file - of which the filename without extensions should be returned
absolute - whether the absolute filepath or just the filename is used
Returns:
the name of the file without any extensions

newFileBasedOn

public static java.io.File newFileBasedOn(java.io.File file,
                                          java.lang.String extension)
Returns a new file with the same name as a given file but with a new extension.

Parameters:
file - for which a new file with a new file extension should be created
extension - file extension of the new file
Returns:
a new file with the same name as a given file but with a new extension
